Item.label: Return to level before power outage

Value.label: Notification when load status changes
Value.Help: Send or not notification when load status changes

Value.label: Default dimming speed (s)
Value.Help: Setp up Default dimming speed in second, 0:Direct, 1:Fast .... 100:Slow. Range : 0:99

Value.label: Enable or Disable pairing to an external network
Value.Help: Enable or Disable pairing to an external network

Value.label: Set way of dimming
Value.Help: Enable or Disable pairing to an external network

Value.label: Default brightness
Value.Help: Setting default brightness when the dimmer is turned on from off status. When the value is set to 0, 1 will be used. Range : 0-99

Value.label: Delay before the load is turned off
Value.Help: Delay before the load is turnd off in seconds. Range : 0-60
